ability.Serene Grace: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

Seismic Toss.effect: Deals 100 HP of damage to the target.

Shadow Ball.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Calm Mind.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Soft-Boiled.effect: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP.
